‘eeta passe mokada une nangi.....?’ ‘ayiya eyage aashawan ista karagaththayin passe ammata kiyanna epa kiyala mata tharjanaya kala.’ ‘ude pandarama amma witharak pirith gedara gihin aawa.ee wenakotath mata mage as wala thibuna kadulu hanganna bari una.ra thissema ada watuna nisa mage kadulen mulu adama thethwela thiyenna athi.amma dakka gaman mata thawath aduna ayiye.mama ammata okkoma dewal kiwa.eda mage punchi hithata echchara loku dukak hanganna bari una.’ ‘eeta passe ekapara kussiyata duwagena giyapu amma kussiye thibuna pihiya aran awith ayiyage kamarayata gihin.tho me athinda yako ara ahinsakita karadara kare kiyala pihiyen ayiyage athata gahala,mechchara wela nida gena ade hitapu ayiya ammawath thallu karala geyin duwala giya giyamayi ada wenakan gedara aawe na.’ ‘eeta passe ayiya gana aaranchiyak nadda.....?’ ‘ee thirisana gedarin gihilla awurudu ganak yanakan aaranchiyak thibune na.eeth lagakadi game kenekuta ayiya hambawela.dan sithulpawwa paththe mesan wadata ath udawu denawalu.awurudu 16 withara podi kellekwa badala lamayith innawalu.ee thirisana gana hoyanna api katawath oona kamak thibune na ayiye.’ ‘eeth mama dan pirimi lamayek ekka yaluyi kiyala bigusara ayiya dannawane.ee ayiya me kathawa danne na ayiye.me kalakanni kellage kathawa gedarin pita danne mage hodama yaluwayi,magema ayiyata wada mata awankawama sahodariyak wage salakana oyayi witharayi ayiye.mata theranna ayiye mama kohomada ee ahinsaka kollawa rawattanne kiyala.mona de unath mama ee manussayata me dewal kiyanna oona.eeth me dewal danagaththayin passe mawa dala giyath kamak na.eeth dala gihin me dewal prasiddha unoth mama kohomada minissunta muhuna denne.anika eya mata samawa dunna kiyamuko eeth mama kohomada bigusara ayiye eyalage ammata mage pirisidu kama oppu karanne.gamwala aya thama oowa balanawa.mama aadare karanna tharam sudusukam nathiwa thiyethdith eyata kamathi una eka waradi.eeth aadare kiyana de matath danenawa ayiye.sadda nathiwama mama eyawa eka sarayak maga harinna haduwa,ammo paw eda eya mawa nathi unoth marenawa kiwa...eth ayiye mama apirisidu kellek bawa dana gaththoth eya man wenuwen marena 1k na.ane ayiye mama dan mokakda karanne....?’
